abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column examines Donald Trump's claim that he had fiduciary duty to keep amount of income taxes he owed to minimum; suggests claim is laughable, as experts say there is no such thing as fiduciary duty to oneself.
lead_paragraph: Experts scoffed at campaign officials’ argument that Donald J. Trump had a “fiduciary duty” to pay no more tax than required.
snippet: Experts scoffed at campaign officials’ argument that Donald J. Trump had a “fiduciary duty” to pay no more tax than required....

headline.main: The Trump Campaign’s Questionable Tax Return Justification
headline.print_headline: A Defense on Taxes That Fails to Add Up
